survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers using subscription-based meal kit services to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the meal kits you receive?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the meal kits you receive?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Include an option for first-time users to segment feedback.

script.question_text: How often do you use the meal kit service?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand priority areas.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this meal kit service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring likelihood to recommend.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this meal kit service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the meal kit service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the meal kit service.
